mapper.select: SELECT id, name, last_name as lastName, email, phone, birth_date as birthDate, user, pass, customer_status_id, registered FROM customer
SELECT id AS label, name AS value FROM customer_status WHERE id = #{customer_status_id}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO customer (name, last_name, email, phone, birth_date, user, pass, customer_status_id, registered) VALUES (#{name}, #{lastName}, #{email}, #{phone}, #{birthDate}, #{user}, #{pass}, #{status.label}, #{registered})
mapper.update: UPDATE customer SET name = #{name}, lastName = #{lastName}, email = #{email}, phone = #{phone}, birth_date = #{birthDate}, user = #{user}, pass = #{pass}, customer_status_id = #{status.label} WHERE id = #{id}
